com.bindroid
Class Binding

java.lang.Object
  com.bindroid.Binding

public class Binding
extends java.lang.Object

Allows two trackable properties to be bound together such that their values remain in sync. It supports one-way and two-way bindings to any properties that use Trackables. ValueConverters allow conversions between the source and target properties to be applied in the binding process.

          Constructs a simple one-way binding between the given properties.

Constructor Detail

Binding

public Binding(Property<?> targetProperty,
               Property<?> sourceProperty)
Constructs a simple one-way binding between the given properties.

Parameters:
targetProperty - The target property, whose value will be set to match the source property.
sourceProperty - The source property, whose value will drive the binding.

Binding

public Binding(Property<?> targetProperty,
               Property<?> sourceProperty,
               BindingMode mode)
Constructs a binding between the given properties.

Parameters:
targetProperty - The target property.
sourceProperty - The source property.
mode - The BindingMode for the binding.

Binding

public Binding(Property<?> targetProperty,
               Property<?> sourceProperty,
               BindingMode mode,
               ValueConverter converter)
Constructs a binding between the given properties.

Parameters:
targetProperty - The target property.
sourceProperty - The source property.
mode - The BindingMode for the binding.
converter - A ValueConverter to be applied whenever changes are detected.

Parameters:
